testcase.name: Check Received Cancelled Order Notification
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees the "Order Details" screen................................passed And the user clicks on the "Cancel" button..................................passed And the user sees the "Cancel Order Confirmation" confirmation..............passed And the user fills the "reason cancel order" field with "I fell"............passed And the user clicks on the "YES Cancel Order" button........................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed Then the user sees the "notification cancel order" notification.............passed
